title: Logging into chat issues
body:
I have been having an issues lately with two things. Firstly it has become hard to log into the game. For some reason my connection time out 4-5 times before I get through. Yes I have been to the support page and have tried all the trouble shooting that Riot has provided. Secondly when I do get into the game I remain disconnected from chat services. It never gives me an option to manually reconnect to the chat just give me the prompt "logging into chat services" at the bottom of the home screen. I found a solution to this issue on the following link. http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1648077
the reason I bring it up though is that it only works once and all my item sets get wiped as well. I would appreciate  any help on this matter and thank you for your time.

replies.body:
Hey Alazrian!

Given that you are experiencing both Login issues as well as chat issues, it's possible that the same root cause is causing both of these issues.  My instincts are telling me that it may be due to a misconfigured Firewall causing these issues.  Essentially, your computer is trying to make these connections to our PvP.net Servers and our Chat Servers, but it keeps getting denied.  Therefore, make sure that you [follow these particular steps](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq2) to ensure your Firewall is properly configured for League of Legends.  

If your still consistently experiencing these errors, then we would need to take a much deeper look at your Network Configuration to try to figure out why this is occurring over and over again.  Since this includes a lot of sensitive information, the best option is to have you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our Tech Specialists can look into the logs in-depth and provide some specific solutions.  In the ticket, include this information:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
